title: shaunfantasy
author: shaunfantasy
content: Recruiting for MintTown Beta TestExciting news: We're launching "Mint Town", a new type of GPT (Get Paid to) reward system service where you can have fun accumulating points and rapidly increase them through games to cash out later.Website : https://minttown.jp/Check out more details about our project: https://www.canva.com/design/DAFw1kSPXbc/h8WJqZwNOR2dh9-pqHLa0A/view?utm_content=DAFw1kSPXbc&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link&utm_source=publishsharelinkWe open 1st beta test and you're invited to be a tester! Here's what you get:1. $20 Amazon gift card for your valuable feedback  2. Early access to a platform where you can earn real money for FREE by completing simple tasks3. The chance to influence the development of a brand new GPT site and be part of the core community.4. Fell free to share this form to your friend if they are interested.Interested? All we need is a bit of your time to explore "Mint Town" and share your thoughts. It's a win-win - you help us improve, and you get rewarded!1. To join us, kindly fill out this form https://forms.gle/7y62Y2rJVqZeRi156 2. We will review your submission to determine if you're a suitable fit for our first beta test. 3. Once the final list is complete, we'll notify you via email or direct message on X (Twitter) and provide you with all the necessary details.4. Feel free to share this form to your friend if they are interested in joining too!Stay updated with Mint Town by following us: https://twitter.com/MintTownEN  Should you have any questions, feel free to ask! We're eager to welcome you on board and look forward to your participation!
